post.body: I now have images of David Hasselhoff in my head. Thanks 4 that. *shivers*
I'm jealous. And surrounded by snow.
You might as well give up. It's a never-ending battle!
Lol.
.....as opposed to children.
Food.
....need....more...SLEEP!....
Definitely gonna b a caffeinated coffee day 2day if I decide 2 stay up. Multiple cups even. blah....
Yay 4 3 hours of sleep. Really.
FINALLY heading to bed....
6:45am....still awake.....fuck.
Beanbag and ass, melded into one. And very sore.
Listening to the hum of my laptop and the furnace. I think I may actually be getting tired. Good thing, I have to get up in 4 1/2 hours.
Happy 2nd birthday to my nephew Parker today. That boy is such a SHITHEAD.
God, I need to find friends who stay up ridiculously late like me. *bangs head on laptop* I can't remember the last time I was THIS bored.
This pb&j sammich tastes like shit. Sadly, I'll probably have another.
Wide awake and bored as hell. *ponders the thought of how boring hell could be* See, that's how fricken' bored I am!
Damn. Not as comfortable as I remember. All hope for a hurt-free butt is lost. :-/
How in the hell did I forget that I own a beanbag? Here I've been sitting on this hard stool to play guitar, when I have a freakin' beanbag!
